short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When browsing Argos.ie, all product codes become links to checkargos.com to determine stock levels in Argos stores in Ireland.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Argos Stockchecker replaces product codes on the argos.ie site with a link to checkargos.com.  This site looks up the stock levels for the desired product in all the Irish stores.

New version does not break javascript.
